field.name: response_template
field.t: You have subscribed to yours new mail messages in odoo.

record.field: data = {} data['partner_message'] = env['mail.message'].browse(bus_message['active_id']) data['partner_message_from'] = data['partner_message'].author_id.name data['partner_message_subject'] = data['partner_message'].subject data['partner_message_date'] = data['partner_message'].date data['partner_message_body'] = tools.html2plaintext(data['partner_message'].body) for user in command.res_users_ids: if user.partner_id.id in data['partner_message'].partner_ids.ids: _logger.debug('q1') telegram_user = env['telegram.user'].search([('res_user', '=', user.id)]) _logger.debug('q2') bus_message['chat_id'] = telegram_user.chat_id _logger.debug('q3')
